title: How to Freshen up Leftover Scones

steps.title: Place the scones into a saucepan that has a lid.
steps.content: Place the scones into a saucepan that has a lid. Put the lid on top.

steps.title: Put the saucepan on low heat.
steps.content: Put the saucepan on low heat. Warm for five minutes. Keep an eye on them, as you don't want the bottoms to burn.

steps.title: Switch off the heat.
steps.content: Switch off the heat. Leave the saucepan with scones sitting on the cooling element for another five minutes.

steps.title: Remove the scones.
steps.content: Remove the scones. They should now be fresher and ready to be eaten straight away.
